events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a male speaker stating that "Gumunting is only for ISA detainees", confirming this statement. He shares he was fortunate to only spend a short time, not being sent to Gumunting, but heard from others that Gumunting is easier than the "60 days" and describes being blindfolded, handcuffed, and transported in a blacked-out van. He recalls a rough ride, with the van driving in circles, resulting in disorientation and carsickness upon arrival at an unknown building, the van driving straight into the building, followed by the opening of the door. The ambient sound of passing traffic persists throughout the recording.
